title: The Queen of Sheba and Solomon’s Wealth
summary: The Queen of Sheba visits Solomon to test his wisdom and is amazed by his wealth and knowledge. Solomon's wealth and splendor are described in detail, showcasing Israel’s golden age.

faq.question: Why did the Queen of Sheba visit Solomon?
faq.answer: To test his wisdom with hard questions.

faq.question: What does this chapter reveal about Solomon’s reign?
faq.answer: That he had unmatched wisdom, wealth, and honor in all the earth.
